resources.string:
This is Main Activity (Home page) of the app, the first Activity open When you run this app 
it show the clickable list of Activity that you can do on the app 
- The Activity that contain PlayLists and song 
- the Payment Activity 
-the upload Activity to add song to play in the app; from the device or some another app.

This Activity contain list of albums and song that ready to play when clicked.
 There will be many buttons: 
- every items in the list go to (Now Playing Activity) 
- and one button for (Upload Activity) to add music. 
- and Home back to main Activity

Activity to add songs from your device or another app or website
 - using MediaPlayer APIs. 
- There are 2 Buttons: 
 - Home back you to main Activity 
 - and Playing lists back you to Playing lists Activity

This activity will contain: 
 - start/pause and forward and backward to play song,
 -and picture of the song and the name of the song.
 There will be 2 buttons: 
- go to (Details Activity) to this item. 
- and Playing lists back you to Playing lists Activity

This display details information about the song and album. 
name of the song, author, albums name, picture, official website and so on. 
There will be 2 buttons: 
 - for going to (PaymentActivity) for paying this song. 
- and Now Playing back you to Now Playing Activity

This Activity represent the payment to pay inside the app..
 using API like: PayPal. There are 2 Buttons. 
 - Home back you to main Activity 
 - and Details to this item payed, back you to Details Activity
